block.p: NATIONAL ENERGY GROUP, Bethesda, Md., a unit of PG & E, the utility owner, said it would sell 11.5 megawatts from its wind-power plant in Madison County, N.Y., to Green Mountain Energy, Austin, Tex., which sells renewable energy to utilities and municipalities.
ELECTRONIC DATA SYSTEMS, Plano, Tex., the provider of computer services, won a four-year, $407 million contract to continue managing California's Medicaid program.

NATIONAL ENERGY GROUP, Bethesda, Md., a unit of PG & E, the utility owner, said it would sell 11.5 megawatts from its wind-power plant in Madison County, N.Y., to Green Mountain Energy, Austin, Tex., which sells renewable energy to utilities and municipalities.
ELECTRONIC DATA SYSTEMS, Plano, Tex., the provider of computer services, won a four-year, $407 million contract to continue managing California's Medicaid program.

NATURAL RESOURCE PARTNERS, Houston, which leases coal mines to producers, said it had acquired reserves of more than 300 million tons in Virginia from Alpha Natural Resources, which is controlled by First Reserve, Greenwich, Conn., an investment firm, for $53.6 million.
